General.Name: CTS International Logistics Corp Ltd
General.Description: CTS International Logistics Corporation Limited, a freight forwarding company, engages in the provision of logistics and supply chain trade services in China and internationally. It provides air, sea and rail integrated logistics services; aviation parts logistics; customs declaration and inspection agency business; customs clearance business comprising general trade, processing trade, customs transfer and return, exhibition business, personal belongings, special supervision area, pre-classification and other services; and packaging, warehousing, trailers, and other one-stop quality services; and custom brokerage services, as well as cross-border e-commerce logistics, international engineering integrated logistics, international warehousing logistics, other international integrated logistics services The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. CTS International Logistics Corporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of China Chengtong Hong Kong Co., Ltd.
